polonnaruwa sita kolambaata yamata paya hatha atak gatha wu kalaya nima kota paya ekahamarakin kolambaa ya haki yugayak wasara dekak thula uda karana bawath janadhipathiwaraya mehidi prakasha kaleya.adhyapana podu sahathika pathra samanya pela wibhagayen ganithaya asamath wana 120,000 kata aasanna daruwan sankhyawa amathaka nokara owun wenuwen wishesha wadapiliwelak sakasana lesa thaman adhyapana amathiwarayata upades dun bawath ee daruwan pasalwalin elawa damimata kisiwakutath ayithiyak nomathi bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.solosmasthanadhipathi wendaruwe upali himiyan pramukha maha sangharathnayath amathiwarun wana maithripala sirisena, bandula gunawardhana, duminda disanayaka, niyojya amathiwarun wana siripala gamlath, chandrasiri suriyaaarachchi, parlimenthu manthri roshan ranasinha, polonnaruwa rajakiya widyalaye widuhalpathi ayi. ke. ke. rawilal wijayawansha mahathwarun athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ekwuha..

wedi thabime siddhiyen pasu kalabalayata path ema jyeshta polis niladhariya anuradhapura pradeshayata palagos athibawa durakathana thorathuru walin helidaraw wi thibe.kurunagala di pasugiya 15da rathriye saka sahitha motar rathayak pariksha karana awasthawe, polisiyata wedi praharayak ellakara pala yaddi athadanguwata path 'moratu roha' wisin helikala karunu anuwa me sambandhayen thorathuru rasak anawaranayawi atha.aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa, kolambaa aparadha kottasaya, kolambaa mathdrawya nashaka anshaya saha kolambaa polisi 12kata pamana awashyawa siti mohu darunuma pathala aparadhakaruwaku bawath, mohu athadanguwata ganima sandaha polis parikshana sidukaramin sitiya di mese hadisiye kotukara ganimata haki wu bawath jyeshta polis niladhariyek kiya.ghathanaya sambandhayen sidukerena parikshanawalin heliwi athi andamata roha samaga mathpan panaya karamin sita athi jyeshta polis niladhariya, anuradhapura wijayapura, bo gaha asaladi 2013 sapthambar masa 02 wanida madhushka harish da silwa yana dedaru piyaku paharagena gos athurudahan karawima sambandhayen da chodana ella wuweki.
